pipeline.name: create-matrix
pipeline.description: Use R to generate a dummy matrix tsv output file with two samples and two features.

task.script: # Generate a dummy matrix tsv output file with two samples and two features. df <- data.frame(ID_REF=c("78495_at", "78383_at"), SampleA=c(10, 20), SampleB=c(30, 40)) write.table(df, file="${output.tsv}", sep="\t", qmethod="double", col.names=TRUE, row.names=FALSE)
